name: Bloodshell: Conviction
description:
Hello everyone.

We follow Iris, a girl who is accused of the murder of her parents.
Doom to life in a psychiatric ward someone allowed her to get back to
school.
But sadly it was just the beginning of darker events.


• A Visual Novel with around 4 hours of content.

• A mix between a comic book and a novel.

• More than 70 artworks of high quality made by hand.

• A great soundtrack of 25 songs.

• Available in English and French
